description.value: -5 Toughness, +5 Fellowship. Gain Speak Language (Hive Dialect) and Tech-Use as untrained basic skills. Crowds do not count as difficult terrain, and running/charging through them give a penalty to Agility Tests to stay upright. Suffer -10 to Survival Tests whilst outside of anywhere with manufactured goods, solid ceilings, and power. -5 to all Intelligence Tests. +1 to all Initiative Rolls.
